text: The Silent Partner (French title: L'argent de la banque) is a 1978 Canadian heist movie and a remake of the 1969 Danish movie Think of a Number. It is based on a novel by Danish writer Anders Bodelsen. The movie was directed by Daryl Duke and written by Curtis Hanson. It stars Elliott Gould, Christopher Plummer and Susannah York. It has been called "one of the few truly good movies to come out of the tax-shelter heyday of the 1970s." ==References== Category:1978 movies Category:Canadian movies Category:Heist movies Category:Movies based on books
title: The Silent Partner (1978 movie)
